name: Flåklypa Grand Prix
description:
In Flåklypa Grand Prix one of the many activities is for the player to help Sonny and Lambert find and win car parts to build "Il Tempo Gigante". Once the car is ready, the player gets to drive this showstopper of a car and some of the other race cars in the Flåklypa Grand Prix.

Hidden around and about on the top of Flåklypa the player can also find lots of mini-games. With skill and practice the player can win bronze, silver and gold medals. These rewards earn car parts for the Il Tempo Gigante. Mini-games include jig-saw puzzles, memory, a Pac-Man like maze game and more.

shot.caption: Sonny's Post Haste!: At Flåklypa Post Office, things get hectic in the run-up to the great car race. You need to stack up in piles and sort out the letters you need for the right time!
Flåklypa Puzzle: Let us see how quickly you can put the puzzle pieces together to complete a puzzle. Choose different sizes and set record times!
Sonny's Apple Harvest: Sonny gathers apples for Lambert's famous apple pie. All the nice red apples have to be collected in the wheelbarrow. But he must avoid the green ones!
Drawer-Of-All-Socks: Let us play a game of memory and see how quickly you can remember where you saw which object and pair them up!
Theodore's Bike Repairs: Theodore doesn't always just repair the tires from a bike, now you have to help him repairing the whole bike by changing certain parts.
Lambert's Labyrinth: Lambert is looking for some honey, and has to find his way through the maze. He also has to bring along everything he can pick up along the way. But watch out for the bees!
The Flåklypa Grand Prix: Play the race when finished your car! When you have found all parts and cleared all stages your car is ready for the big race! Good luck!
In game adventuring! - At the top of Flåklypa you should try out some of the games and the adventures you can find. Try finding some new car parts sounds like a good idea!
